lead_paragraph: Only Kemba Walker and Jimmer Fredette have captivated the crowds and moved the prospective N.B.A. needle more than Arizona’s Derrick Williams.
snippet: Only Kemba Walker and Jimmer Fredette have captivated the crowds and moved the prospective N.B.A. needle more than Arizona’s Derrick Williams.
